001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.validator;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.QueryResponse;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * Defines the contract for validating database query responses.
010 *
011 * <p>This interface provides a mechanism for applying assertions on query results,
012 * ensuring data integrity and expected outcomes in database interactions.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
015 */
016public interface QueryResponseValidator {
017
018   /**
019    * Validates a database query response against the provided assertions.
020    *
021    * <p>This method processes the query result and applies the assertions to check
022    * conditions such as row count, specific field values, and structural integrity.
023    *
024    * @param queryResponse The query response to validate.
025    * @param assertions    The assertions used for validation.
026    * @param <T>           The expected data type for assertion validation.
027    * @return A list of assertion results indicating pass or failure for each assertion.
028    */
029   <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validateQueryResponse(QueryResponse queryResponse, Assertion... assertions);
030}
